title: Home Routine
description: Talk about simple daily routine at home.

steps.pinyin: wǒ zài jiā kàn diàn shì.
wǒ cháng cháng zài fáng jiān dú shū.
steps.english_hint: I often study in my room.

steps.pinyin: wǒ yǒu shí hòu zài kè tīng gōng zuò.
steps.english_hint: Sometimes I work in the living room.

steps.pinyin: wǒ zài chú fáng zuò fàn.
tā zài yáng tái hē kā fēi.
steps.english_hint: He drinks coffee on the balcony.

steps.pinyin: wǒ men zài jiā chī wǎn cān.
wǒ xǐ huān zài shā fā shàng xiū xí.
steps.english_hint: I like to rest on the sofa.

steps.pinyin: shuì jiào qián wǒ huì kàn shǒu jī.
steps.english_hint: Before sleeping, I look at my phone.

steps.pinyin: tā zǎo shàng zhěng lǐ fáng jiān.
steps.english_hint: He tidies his room in the morning.

steps.pinyin: jīn tiān wǒ zài jiā fàng sōng.

review.summary: You can now describe your simple home routine in Chinese.
review.mission: Final lesson of this chapter: mixed practice with short dialogues.
